title: Game is unplayable because of my MS
body:
My MS on the right upper hand of the game screen is always at 200 and goes up to 5k MS all throughout the game. It was never this bad before recently.

I want to play, but it affects the play of the game so much it sucks...

I lowered all the setting to low graphics and stuff and still the same, even when I have nothing running in the background it seems league of legends uses a lot of my cpu usage? I am not sure, but it was never this bad, consistently every game...

Need some help, thanks!

replies.body:
Here is a 2750 Ms one :D


NETWORK DIAGNOSTIC OVERALL RATING: MAJOR ISSUES

Ping Over Time
 0ms500ms1000ms1500ms2000ms2500ms3000ms

Your average ping was 205 milliseconds.

The worst ping you experienced was 2750ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this.
	
Packet Loss Over Time
 0%10%20%30%40%50%

Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 9.31%.

Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss.

Oooooo yea that packet loss is most likely the main source of your problems. That packet loss is the weird way that your connection is being routed like I mentioned in my previous post, and sadly sometimes the issue lays on the ISP side of things so there might not be much we can do. 

With that being said, go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and shoot them those logs you just used. They'll be able to look through your logs to see if there's anything we can help with on our end!

That sucks! I been playing since Vlad and Xin came out, I think? 

Been years now and many accounts later, lol.

But I guess I finally have to quit because of the packet loss making it impossible to play a decent game.

Comcast sucks, :(

Yeeeaaaa those 5k MS spikes are definitely gonna make you have a hard time in League =\ . It may not have anything to do with your own system, but more in the way that your connection is being routed to our servers. Let's check up on the health of that connection as it travels to us by using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Take a screenshot of what it shows and post it here so we can look over it together.

This is my traceroute when run 5 minutes with WinMTR

https://ibb.co/j2FXpa

Thanks for reply, this is what I got back for just 1 recent game log I uploaded.
